title: Jamaican jerk chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 small onion, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', 'small handful chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 habanero chilli, sliced', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into strips']
